1.0.name: wordpress/27coupons
1.0.description: This plugin will create a widget which will display latest discount coupons and deals of Indian e-commerce websites from 27coupons.com. You can customize the plugin to change the title and number of deals to be displayed. You can also monetize this widget. Please visit our webiste to know more. For any customizations of this plugin, please contact us at http://www.27coupons.com/wp-widget/ If you are interested in creating your own plugin using our coupons data check http://api.27coupons.com/.
